title: Beyond the Horror: Cult Episode 6
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment:
I love that, Mary! Ally definitely may have carried Ivy’s egg... and who’s sperm!? Dun dun dun! Is Kai the donor and that’s why he’s watched Ally for so long?
I still think Ally will sacrifice herself for Oz... “love story for the ages” is still sticking out to me, this is sooo Candyman #BeesAreTheFirstCult

I agree this episode was great this season is one of my favorites. I too want to see one of the unedited version. The scene with Kai and Meadows was hot but disturbing. Tell Casey I also have raisins on my dresser. They are very good, but I only eat a few. Great live stream. I'm going to Gaga too!

This stream cut out on me so bad last night, I only connected twice for a minute... but the episode was sooo good! The unedited version is AWESOME! 
I really wanted to talk to y’all on stream but oh well, hopefully at see you at 9 Mary ;)
Happy B Day Casey! Hope you had a great one :D

these last two episodes restored my faith in the show, but it's ludicrous for them to expect people to wait over a month into a show for it to be good

i'm on the rare side of people who didn't love the season, but it's gaining speed, sad it's almost over now
description:
VIDEO CONTAINS SPOILERS FOR American Horror Story, Season 7, Episode 6!!!

Beyond the Horror: Cult, is an unofficial American Horror Story Live After Show. Hosted by MaryGirl Moody. Guests include: Maisie Andrews, Casey Soper, and Jonas Bendor. We discuss and review each episode of American Horror Story Cult.
